extendedInfo.description: Can you remember a time you've visited a public restroom and not seen creative writings on the toilet stall wall? Neither can we..... Introducing the new, modern way to write on a toilet stall wall - with your Android Phone or Android Tablet! Bathroom Stall is just like the real thing! A totally anonymous place to leave you thoughts, nobody will ever know you wrote it! We've taken it a step further though, imagine writing your creative thoughts on a bathroom stall wall, and being notified when someone wants to respond to your stall comments! It's now possible.... it's a fun and anonymous way to share secrets with the world. Features include: Totally anonymous comments - nobody will know you shared your thoughts on the wall. Read what people think - Read comments that others leave (anonymously) regarding your writings. It's the next best thing to actually writing on a bathroom wall - only ours doesn't stink!This is our very first Android app, it's emotional for us and may not be the best, so be gentle on us! :)

reviews.comment: It sucks!! The comments don\'t even work!! Needs to be fixed. Super inappropriate too\342\200\246

reviews.comment: Great concept too bad the people using it are mostly immature losers. Had to weed through a bunch of \"im doing ur mum\" and \"im horny\" for good stuff.

reviews.comment: Difficult to figure out how to post, no confirmation of posts or of replies, so I still don\'t know if they actually went out. It is an interesting idea, but was poorly executed.
